text: Wang Kuang-hui (; 12 November 1964 â€“ 30 August 2021) was a Taiwanese professional baseball player and coach. He spent his entire playing and coaching career in the Chinese Professional Baseball League with the Brother Elephants team. His playing career lasted from 1990 until 2004. Wang's managing career lasted from 2007 until 2009. Wang was born in Hualien County, Taiwan. Wang died on 30 August 2021 in Taipei from liver cancer, aged 56. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Baseball coaches Category:Baseball players Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Taiwanese sportspeople
title: Wang Kuang-hui
